column2: If we cooperated with other powerful countries, those Federation goons probably wouldn’t attack us anymore.

Come to think of it, our neighbors in Saronia also stand against the Federation. Then again, if we joined forces with another country, we’d just become even more obvious targets. Makes it tough for the princess to reach out.
I wonder if there aren’t any powerful countries or organizations out there that we could ask for help.
I hear that Saronia’s thane has been deposed.
